user_query: I want to surprise my friends with a unique gift. Can you help me find a product that falls under the category 'handmade'? Additionally, provide me with the translation of the word 'surprise' in French. Also, fetch the details of a specific handmade product with the ID 13579.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of handmade products based on category.
Fetch the details of the handmade product with ID 13579.
